Anonymous CVS is also available: 

cvs -d:pserver:anonymous@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/qwtplot3d login
cvs -z3 -d:pserver:anonymous@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/qwtplot3d co qwtplot3d
